Global logistics for your business - fast, reliable, efficient

Caspian Logistic Company

Comprehensive solutions for transporting goods around the world. From small shipments to large shipments, we guarantee reliability and timely delivery. Our company cooperates with the largest transport operators and offers individual routes for each client. We know how important each part is and ensure complete control over logistics processes at all stages.

Air transportation

Air transportation

Calculation of rates for air transport
Choosing the optimal airline and transportation route
Receipt, storage, delivery of goods from the senders' warehouse to departure airports in Russia and around the world
Delivery of goods to the recipients' warehouses
Transportation monitoring
Processing of import and export documents in the countries of departure and destination

Road transportation

Road transportation

International and domestic Russian transportation
Transport of dangerous and oversized goods
Transportation of goods with temperature conditions
Transportation under the transit procedure
Local cargo deliveries
Insurance, handling, customs clearance, storage in stock

Sea and river transportation

Sea and river transportation

Organization of freight and port services. Advance payments to transport and port organizations
Organization of transshipment and intraport forwarding, including a comprehensive service for export and import categories of cargo
Drawing up contracts with the port and charters for the transportation of goods with shipowners, as well as organizing individual charter parties
Working with ship agents
Calculation of freight rates for the transportation of container, bulk, general and design cargo in various directions
Chartering of various types of vessels

Rail transportation

Rail transportation

Calculation of railway tariffs (exports, imports, transit)
Comprehensive organization and coordination of the transportation of goods by rail
Preparation of a package of shipping documents
Inspections and surveys of cargo before shipment and during travel
Accompanying and carrying out loading and unloading operations

Multimodal transportation

Multimodal transportation

Constant control over the movement of cargo carried out by the logistics company
Close cooperation of all participants in the transport process, efficiency of data transfer
Coordination of actions from a single transportation center
Rationalization of transport costs, thanks to the preparation of an optimal transportation scheme
Ability to transport consolidated cargo
Minimizing the delivery time of goods thanks to the coordinated actions of participants in the logistics process

Document preparation

CLC offers a full range of transport documentation services for all types of transportation. We ensure legal accuracy, efficiency and compliance with international and Russian standards.

CMR consignment note (ТТН, CMR, Air Waybill, Bill of Lading)
Export-import documents (invoices, packing lists, certificates)
Permits, licenses, insurance policies
Documents for customs clearance and certification
Experience with domestic and international cargo transportation
Knowledge of legal requirements in different countries
Minimising the risks of delays and penalties
Individual approach to each client
You can order turnkey documents

Delivery schemes

We develop customized logistics delivery schemes to reduce time, reduce costs and minimize risks at every step of the way. We use all available modes of transport to choose the most efficient route.

Analysis of cargo characteristics and time requirements
Choosing the best routes and modes of transport
Calculation of cost and delivery time
Control of congestion and docking points
Adaptation of logistics to seasonal and geopolitical factors
Deep expertise in international and domestic logistics
Flexible solutions for all volumes and types of cargo
Own developments on routes and partner channels
24/7 support at all stages of delivery

Warehouse services

Warehouse services for integrated logistics in Russia and around the world CLC provides a full range of warehouse services, ensuring reliable storage, processing and distribution of goods at all stages of transportation —, be it air, road, rail, sea, river or multimodal transportation.

Temporary and long-term storage of goods
Loading and unloading operations (manual and mechanized)
Cross-docking and cargo consolidation
Packaging, labeling, palletizing
Security, temperature and humidity control systems
Integration of warehouse and transportation solutions into a single logistics chain
Shorter delivery times due to efficient distribution
Transparent terms and flexible tariffs
The possibility of organizing turnkey warehouses in any region

Optimization of transportation costs

Freight safety and insurance

Optimal path schemes

Full freight forwarding

Document preparation

Communication with clients
